languages.text: "Мы собираемся прервать Цикл. Разве не очевидно?" {n}В каркающий голос примешивается нотка сарказма.{/n}
"We intend to discontinue the Cycle. Is that not obvious?" {n}There is a note of sarcasm in Brasswhisper's croaking voice.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Мы собираемся прервать Цикл. Разве не очевидно?" {n}В каркающий голос примешивается нотка сарказма.{/n}

languages.text: 「サイクルを断ち切るのだよ。わからないのか？」{n}ブラスウィスパーは、しわがれた声で皮肉を付け加える。{/n}
languages.original_text: "We intend to discontinue the Cycle. Is that not obvious?" {n}There is a note of sarcasm in Brasswhisper's croaking voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「サイクルを断ち切るのだよ。わからないのか？」{n}ブラスウィスパーは、しわがれた声で皮肉を付け加える。{/n}
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: “我们打算终止循环，这不是显而易见的吗？”{n}铜语沙哑的声音中隐含着一丝讽刺。{/n}
languages.original_text: "We intend to discontinue the Cycle. Is that not obvious?" {n}There is a note of sarcasm in Brasswhisper's croaking voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我们打算终止循环，这不是显而易见的吗？”{n}她沙哑的声音中隐含着一丝讽刺。{/n}
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: « Nous avons l'intention d'interrompre le Cycle. Il me semblait pourtant que c'était évident, » {n}répond Murmecuivre avec une pointe de sarcasme dans la voix.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We intend to discontinue the Cycle. Is that not obvious?" {n}There is a note of sarcasm in Brasswhisper's croaking voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons l'intention d'interrompre le Cycle. Il me semblait pourtant que c'était évident, » {n}répond-elle avec une pointe de sarcasme dans la voix.{/n}
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: «Hemos intentado interrumpir el Ciclo, ¿no te parece obvio?». {n}La áspera voz de Susurro de latón tiene un matiz de sarcasmo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We intend to discontinue the Cycle. Is that not obvious?" {n}There is a note of sarcasm in Brasswhisper's croaking voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Hemos intentado interrumpir el Ciclo, ¿no te parece obvio?». {n}Su áspera voz tiene un matiz de sarcasmo.{/n}
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: "Wir haben vor den Zyklus zu unterbrechen. Ist das nicht offensichtlich?" {n}Ein Anflug von Sarkasmus liegt in Messingflüsterers krächzender Stimme.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We intend to discontinue the Cycle. Is that not obvious?" {n}There is a note of sarcasm in Brasswhisper's croaking voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben vor den Zyklus zu unterbrechen. Ist das nicht offensichtlich?" {n}Ein Anflug von Sarkasmus liegt in ihrer krächzenden Stimme.{/n}
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: "Döngü'nün süreğini bozma niyetindeyiz. Belli olmuyor mu?" {n}Pirinçfısıltı'nın hırıltılı sesinde iğneleyici tınılar var.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We intend to discontinue the Cycle. Is that not obvious?" {n}There is a note of sarcasm in Brasswhisper's croaking voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Döngü'nün süreğini bozma niyetindeyiz. Açık değil mi?" {n}Pirinçfısıltı'nın hırıltılı sesinde iğneleyici tınılar var.{/n}
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper
